title: The Writer's Almanac  - Thursday, December 12, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of novelist Gustav Flaubert (1821), and physician and poet Erasmus Darwin (1731), grandfather of Charles Darwin.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of novelist Gustav Flaubert (1821), and physician and poet Erasmus Darwin (1731), grandfather of Charles Darwin.
